university.name: Lovely Professional University
university.about: Lovely Professional University (LPU) is a premier private university in Punjab, India, offering a vast range of programs and fostering a culture of research and innovation. With a strong focus on industry collaboration, we prepare students for successful careers in the rapidly evolving global landscape.
